subject: Re: [junit] Compiling JUnit
msgSnippet: ... Please give :- http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html a quick scan, and then read your post. I m sure you have tried many things, but unless
messageBody:
fstatovci wrote:
> I am new to Junit and I would like to start using it. I started
> reading a little bit about it, and downloaded some code and I wanted
> to build my own test classes using annotations, but I could not
> compile them. Can someone explain to me my how to go about compiling
> junit classes? I am using junit 4.3.1 version, since it seems to be
> the latest one.
> What am i missing here????

Please give :-

http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html

a quick scan, and then read your post.

I'm sure you have tried many things, but unless you provide a 'hook' for
an answer, we can only guess what it is you actually need, to kick-start
you.

--
Mark
